LanguageData.VME_LeatherApparel_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.VME_LeatherApparel_Abhorrent.description: Slaughtering an animal to use its skin as apparel is cruel and inhumane.
LanguageData.VME_LeatherApparel_Disliked.label: disliked
LanguageData.VME_LeatherApparel_Disliked.description: Using animal leathers is something that should be avoided.
